Text: Can't wait to see this. Amzing work. Thank you~

Wonderful, beautiful and horrible account from those who were there in the early 80ies in San Francisco. Those who survived AIDS to live to give their accounts of what happened all those decades ago. This is so powerful! This made me cry. We've lost so many wonderful people to this horrible disease and not just in SF. This scourge is continuing to infect and kill people all over the planet.

It doesn't matter if you are gay or hetero or anywhere in between. It doesn't matter if you are male or female or anywhere in between.

Download this! Watch this! And seed this! Do not let the memories die!
